snippet.title: Persona 3 FES The Answer Boss Metis
snippet.description:
PERSONA 4 GOLDEN THE MOVIE
THE MOVIE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=67aQaRVT8z0
ALL SOCIAL LINKS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yc_KMvloSYE
ALL BAD ENDINGS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7oLw21o9_pA
ALL ENDINGS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OEPbDGgQrdI
ALL MARIE'S POEMS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4O0_4QphWY
ALL BONUS TV LISTING: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hg1v_SHIJJE
PERSONA 4 THE MOVIE
THE MOVIE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBFoInTUzp8
ALL SOCIAL LINKS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rO2CWlUlzCo
ALL BAD ENDINGS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WXX6VLRWNew
ALL ENDINGS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r3ODhXaFxdY
PERSONA 3 FES THE MOVIE
THE JOURNEY MOVIE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CO2Z6sLsU-s
THE ANSWER MOVIE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uLDs0xCl-7Q
ALL SOCIAL LINKS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9fzxC7HdYzA

Persona 3 FES The Answer Boss Metis

Played on PCSX2 emulator

Not rly a Boss anyway.

The Answer play through is more challenging than The Journey. For most ppl this mode is very difficulty, cuz its set on Hard automatically, and you cannot change the difficulty.

Its also more of a dungeon crawler that bores most ppl to even bother playing this mode.

What makes The Answer Hard?
No difficulty change
Bosses have dodge elements/attacks, and they always know to target the weakness most of the time.
Fighting different Bosses at the same time that need to be scanned to avoid stupidity of the AI.
Have to farm Persona's to fuse them.
No elemental resistance armors (beside Final Gear)

WIDESCREEN HACK:
http://i.imgur.com/1TebYph.gif
My settings:
http://gyazo.com/5514762b210777b529672bf60267a459
My Specs:
http://gyazo.com/ef2e7c8e56110a35b03457d2f7ec9577
